Class Client

java.lang.Object
Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
PersoanaFizica, PersoanaJuridica
public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
Aceasta clasa reprezinta un client.
